divs: sighting detailsi would have though it was a satellite but this thing was huge and flew a straight line path. i saw it cross the whole sky. it was moving very slow i had time to run inside and get my wife so she saw it to. this thing was very bright and very big w\ no sound what so ever. i know others had to see this thing. this was in mays bend in pell city from 7:14pm to 7:20pm. @ 7:20pm it was out of sight. way to big and way to slow to be a satellite. plus it looked like it was flying lower then the planes i saw in the air. i have reported stuff before but this was by far the strangest thing i have seen yet.
Summary: IT LOOKED LIKE JUPITER BUT 5 TIMES BIGGER
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pell City
There were no other sightings in Pell City on or around October 16th 2011
